page.title: 01STROMNESS
page.content: {Stromness}is a small rural{town with a {character}of its own. It is built on a slope jutting down to the sea.Its historic sights are a wonder to see and the sea is a sanctuary for birds and a perfect environment for the occasional seal who cares to drop in. The houses are a mixture of old and new techniques and designs _ a true display of good quality workmanship and architecture. Some of the older ones still retain their individual piers from which in olden days the inhabitants caught their dinner.The sea provides a fertile area for fishing from which Stromness fishermen bring their catch. The land around the town provides many farmers with their livelihood. Venues for recreation of various types add to the attraction of the town.
